description:
Relish yourself with a real diamond in the rough with this 2002 Mercedes-Benz G-500 w/ Maybach upgrades.

Completed in a rare blue exterior wrap with a 4x4 squared body kit that complements the custom diamond-stitched leather interior standing on a set of massive 22" Black rims. Underneath the hood, you will reveal a massive 5.0L V8 engine paired to a five (5) speed automatic transmission layered with Mercedes-Benz’s All-Wheel Drive system (AWD). 

Sidestep into the interior and you will be impressed to find features including a sunroof, driver memory seat, carbon fibre interior trim, Maybach emblemed steering wheel, steering wheel-mounted controls, dual climate control, heated front and rear seats, navigation, power windows, power door locks, power side mirrors and so much more. 

Don’t miss your chance to take home this 2002 Mercedes-Benz G-500 w/ Maybach upgrades! 

 

Limitless Auto Sales Inc. is here to serve you! We have great vehicles for amazing prices!

Our finance solutions help you get into the car of your dreams for great monthly payments that fit your lifestyle and financials!

Live in the moment and make every day meaningful with this 2019 Ram 1500 Sport that just recently arrived at our location. 

Glazed in a Delmonico Red Pearl exterior with a vented hood, running boards, turn signal integrated side mirrors, dual exhaust, tonneau cover that complements the Black leather interior, standing strong on a set of 20" alloy wheels. Pop open the hood, and you will reveal a 5.7 V8 HEMI engine that is paired to an eight (8) speed automatic transmission layered with Ram’s 4x4 system. 

Slide into the interior and you will be impressed to find features including navigation, backup camera, heated and cooled front seats, steering wheel-mounted controls, heated steering wheel, power windows, power door locks, power side mirrors, dual climate control, Bluetooth, Uconnect, A/C, push-button, power front seats with power lumbar support, power-adjustable foot pedals, automatic headlights and so much more. 

Don’t miss your chance to take home this 2019 Ram 1500 Sport today!

Sidestep into the interior and you will find features including a sunroof, navigation, backup camera, heated front seats, power front seats with lumbar support, steering wheel mounted controls, Bluetooth, CD player, power windows, power door locks, power side mirrors and so much more.

Step into the interior and be impressed to find features including heated front seats, Bluetooth, AM/FM radio, CD player, power windows, power door locks, power side mirrors, steering wheel-mounted controls, power driver seat and so much more.
